RESOLVED_ENTITIES.marked United States Border Patrol sedan: the marked United States Border Patrol sedan
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the window of the marked United States B: the window of the marked United States Border Patrol sedan
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the front seat of the pickup truck campe: the front seat of the pickup truck camper
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the back seat of the pickup truck camper: the back seat of the pickup truck camper

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the pickup truck camper: Vehicle suspected of carrying people, traveling northbound on Interstate Highway 35, with three females in the front seat and five or six men in the back seat
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the marked United States Border Patrol s: Vehicle used by United States Border Patrol agents Stanley Pruszenski and Alfred Baron for surveillance, from which Baron observed the occupants of the pickup truck camper
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the window of the marked United States B: Window through which Baron leaned out to observe the pickup truck camper
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the front seat of the pickup truck campe: Seat where three females were observed by Baron
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the back seat of the pickup truck camper: Seat where five or six men were observed by Baron, who attempted to conceal themselves when a flashlight was shined
